department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: mask; the face with a domed forehead with the sweeping eyebrows meeting in the centre above the heavy-lidded pierced eyes; the nose upturned with pierced nostrils; the open mouth with filed teet; original woven fibre headgear at the back; heavy covering of tukula and kaolin; fine patina
medium: soft, light-weight wood, woven vegetable fibre, kaolin and tukula pigment
title: Domed Forehead Mask
